text: Daniela Alexandra Arias Rojas (born 31 August 1994) is a Colombian footballer who plays as a defender for Independiente Medellín and the Colombia women's national team. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Colombian women's footballers Category:People from Bucaramanga Category:Colombia women's international footballers Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Colombia Category:Pan American Games medalists in football Category:Footballers at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Atlético Bucaramanga footballers Category:Independiente Medellín footballers
title: Daniela Arias
